index.name: gulp
index.subtitle: Gulp
index.about: Gulp is a build system that can improve how you develop websites by automating common tasks, such as compiling preprocessed CSS, minifying JavaScript and reloading the browser.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about Gulp.

videos.title: Installing and Introducing Gulp
videos.description: Get started with Gulp! Here we cover the basics of what Gulp can do for you and how you can get started using Gulp right now!

videos.title: Using plugins and minifying JavaScript
videos.description: In this video, we put Gulp to work for us by adding in a JavaScript minification plugin to minify our JavaScript for us.

videos.title: Named Tasks
videos.description: In this video we create a named Gulp task and then run that from within our default task we created in the last video.

videos.title: Watching files with Gulp
videos.description: Keep Gulp running watching files for changes and then run tasks with Gulp Watch.

videos.title: Compiling Sass with Gulp
videos.description: Here we show you how to build Sass into your Styles task by compiling your Sass with Gulp.

videos.title: Keep Gulp running with Plumber
videos.description: Learn how to prevent Gulp from stopping when encountering an error with Gulp Plumber.

videos.title: Handling errors without Plumber
videos.description: Here we show you how to keep Gulp running and handle errors without Plumber.

videos.title: LiveReload with Gulp
videos.description: Here we show you how to trigger LiveReload with Gulp.

videos.title: Easy Image Compression
videos.description: Here we show you how to easily compress images in a Gulp task.

videos.title: Automatic Browser Prefixing
videos.description: Here we show you how to easily prefix your CSS automatically in a Gulp task.

videos.title: Gulp Resources and What's Next
videos.description: Here we show you what's next and how you can keep advancing your Gulp knowledge.
